meanings.definition: As much as an arm can hold.
meanings.sent2: He hugged his teddy bear armful.
meanings.sent3: The puppy tried to climb the stairs armful.
meanings.sent4: The music filled the room armful.

meanings.definition: The amount that can be held in one arm.
meanings.sent1: She picked an armful of flowers from the garden.
meanings.sent2: He carried an armful of books to the library.
meanings.sent3: The toddler grabbed an armful of toys and ran off.
meanings.sent4: The chef chopped an armful of vegetables for the soup.
meanings.sent5: The student collected an armful of leaves for the science project.
